trans-unit.target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_ERKENRAD_000_000<tab>Just say the word, and I'll send you and yours to the internment hulk extending from the Burning Wall fragment. If you have any questions, now's the time to ask them.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A1_000_011<tab>Ask about the Final Coil of Bahamut.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A1_100_012<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」をGREED限定で開始
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A1_101_012<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」をマスタールートで開始
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_00105_Q3_000_015<tab>What would you like to ask about?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_00105_A3_000_016<tab>Entry requirements for the Final Coil of Bahamut.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_00105_A3_000_017<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_ERKENRAD_000_020<tab>Two internment hulks remain that need to be disabled. Though you've already cleaned out a couple of others, there's no guarantee that it'll be the same this time. Make sure you go fully prepared.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The Final Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>turns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within the Final Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter the Final Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “Fragments of Truth.”
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members whose progress is different may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>Those who have not advanced as far as the party leader will have their progress updated to be the same as that of the leader.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Those who have advanced further than the party leader, on the other hand, will retain their progress.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_100_057<tab>In this latter case, you will not receive rewards from dungeons that you have already completed, and the number of coffers that pop will be adjusted accordingly.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into the Final Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_Q2_100_100<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「GREED限定」で開始しますか？
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_Q2_101_100<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「マスタールート」で開始しますか？
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A2_000_101<tab>Yes
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A2_000_102<tab>No
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>)) /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_ERKENRAD_000_200<tab>Throughout northern Thanalan, you'll see strange formations of corrupted crystals. Folk call them Dalamud's Talons, and they're grim monuments of the Seventh Umbral Era's calamitous arrival.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have recently completed the Final Coil of Bahamut, and cannot enter again until progress is reset.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_Q3_000_300<tab>Awaiting entry confirmation from party members.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A3_000_301<tab>Cancel
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A3_000_340<tab>このコンテンツを攻略済みのメンバーが、<var 20 E803 /var>名存在するため、宝箱の出現数は「<var 20 E804 /var>個」となります。 「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を開始しますか？

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A3_000_350<tab><var 08 E4E80302 ((One member)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) /var> members)) /var> of your party <var 08 E4E80302 ((has)) ((have)) /var> already progressed beyond <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>. As a result, <var 08 E4E80402 ((<var 08 E804 ((<var 08 E2E8040B ((<var 09 E804 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var> treasure coffer)) ((<var 08 E804 ((<var 08 E2E8040B ((<var 09 E804 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var> treasure coffers)) /var> will pop upon completion. Do you wish to proceed?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A3_100_350<tab>このコンテンツを攻略済みのメンバーが、<var 20 E803 /var>名存在するため、宝箱の出現数は「<var 20 E804 /var>個」となります。 「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「GREED限定」で開始しますか？
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDEENTRANCEWILD2_A3_101_350<tab>このコンテンツを攻略済みのメンバーが、<var 20 E803 /var>名存在するため、宝箱の出現数は「<var 20 E804 /var>個」となります。 「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「マスタールート」で開始しますか？
